name: Threefold Form
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Legacy of the First World © 2017, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, F (a green, three-pointed knot made of mithral worth 729 gp)
text:
You pull forth idealized versions of yourself at various ages from your mind, splitting into three copies of yourself.

Threefold form functions as bilocation, except there are three of you instead of two, and each of the three bodies is under the effect of threefold aspect with a different idealized age. Other than the differences from threefold aspect, each body shares all other effects with you, as normal for bilocation.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势，器材（一个由秘银制成的价值729gp的绿色三端之结）
text_zh: 你从你的脑海中唤出了你在不同年龄下最理想的样子，并将其分成三个你的复制品。三重形态和二重分身（开拓者RPG异能冒险 158）的效果差不多，但是将会出现三个你而不是两个，这三副躯体都处在三相APG的效果之下，每一个都处于不同的理想年龄。除开三相带来的影响外，每一个身体都拥有所有影响着你的效果，就如同一般的双重分身一样。
